words.back: to resume, recover, start again, take back
to set off again, start up again
to take for a walk, go for a walk
to tighten; to extend, stretch; tender
to remark; to notice, point out
statement, list; relieved; put in relief; rolled up
to spot, pick out, locate, find
to go out again, come out again, take out again
to live again, come back life, revive
to cross again, retake, show again, iron
to win again, regain, get back, make up
to give back, return, give more
to fall again, fall down again
priority, having priority, having right of way
to close again, shut again, close up
to straighten, set right, redress, turn around
to fold, roll up, fold up, withdraw
